title: sieve1.go only runs on one core
body:
by **tschaboo**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. cd doc/progs; 6g sieve1.go ; 6l sieve1.6
2. ./6.out # let run for a while

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
Since this is a demonstration for multithreading i expect to use the two
cores of my CPU and show >100% in top. Instead I see one core fully
utilized the other one idle.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux/amd64

Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)
3975:b51fd2d6c160

Please provide any additional information below.
